meanings.definition: The quality of being fond of or inclined to drink alcohol.
meanings.sent1: His bibulousness was evident as he eagerly accepted another round of drinks.
meanings.sent2: Her bibulousness at the party was quite noticeable as she made her way to the bar multiple times.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bibulousness, he always managed to keep a clear head and make responsible decisions.
meanings.sent4: The bibulousness of the group was like a sponge soaking up every drop of alcohol in sight.
meanings.sent5: The bibulousness of the celebration could be seen in the overflowing glasses and merry laughter.

meanings.definition: The state of being absorbent or soaking up liquids.
meanings.sent1: The bibulousness of the paper towel allowed it to quickly soak up the spilled water.
meanings.sent2: The sponge's bibulousness made it the perfect tool for cleaning up the kitchen mess.
meanings.sent3: The bibulousness of the cloth was put to the test when it absorbed the entire spilled drink.
meanings.sent4: The bibulousness of the soil was so great that it drank up all the rainwater in no time.
meanings.sent5: The plant's bibulousness was evident as it absorbed water from the soil to nourish itself.
